Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The record id for unique identification of test result record
Columns.Name: RecordId

Columns.Description: The connection monitor resource id of the test
Columns.Name: ConnectionMonitorResourceId

Columns.Description: The test group name to which the test belongs to
Columns.Name: TestGroupName

Columns.Description: The test configuration name to which the test belongs to
Columns.Name: TestConfigurationName

Columns.Description: The type of the source machine configured for the test
Columns.Name: SourceType

Columns.Description: The resource id of the source machine
Columns.Name: SourceResourceId

Columns.Description: The address of the source configured for the test
Columns.Name: SourceAddress

Columns.Description: The subnet of the source
Columns.Name: SourceSubnet

Columns.Description: The IP address of the source
Columns.Name: SourceIP

Columns.Description: The source end point name
Columns.Name: SourceName

Columns.Description: The source agent id
Columns.Name: SourceAgentId

Columns.Description: The destination port configured for the test
Columns.Name: DestinationPort

Columns.Description: The type of the destination machine configured for the test
Columns.Name: DestinationType

Columns.Description: The resource id of the Destination machine
Columns.Name: DestinationResourceId

Columns.Description: The address of the destination configured for the test
Columns.Name: DestinationAddress

Columns.Description: If applicable, the subnet of the destination
Columns.Name: DestinationSubnet

Columns.Description: The IP address of the destination
Columns.Name: DestinationIP

Columns.Description: The destination end point name
Columns.Name: DestinationName

Columns.Description: The destination agent id
Columns.Name: DestinationAgentId

Columns.Description: The protocol of the test
Columns.Name: Protocol

Columns.Description: The total number of checks done under the test
Columns.Name: ChecksTotal

Columns.Description: The total number of checks failed under the test
Columns.Name: ChecksFailed

Columns.Description: The result of the test
Columns.Name: TestResult

Columns.Description: The result criterion of the test
Columns.Name: TestResultCriterion

Columns.Description: The checks failed percent threshold set for the test
Columns.Name: ChecksFailedPercentThreshold

Columns.Description: The round trip threshold (ms) set for the test
Columns.Name: RoundTripTimeMsThreshold

Columns.Description: The minimum round trip time (ms) for the test
Columns.Name: MinRoundTripTimeMs

Columns.Description: The maximum round trip time for the test
Columns.Name: MaxRoundTripTimeMs

Columns.Description: The average round trip time for the test
Columns.Name: AvgRoundTripTimeMs

Columns.Description: The mean deviation round trip time for the test
Columns.Name: JitterMs

Columns.Description: The additional data for the test
Columns.Name: AdditionalData

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
